alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 10:57PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 1200 FEET... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected tonight with a dusting to 1 inch of additional accumulations for foothill elevations above 1200 feet, especially communities across the 210 corridor. There is also a chance that snow could mix down as low as 1000 feet, but no accumulations are expected at that elevation. * WHERE...Higher elevations of the San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially across the 210 corridor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
